Instruction: In a medium bowl, beat together the eggs, sugar, and vanilla extract until well combined.
Combine chili, black beans, and onion in a bowl.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. Remove the foil and bake an additional 10 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbling.
Remove aluminum foil and bake until cheese is melted and golden brown, about 10 more minutes.
